channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2024021037
item.description:
Report X-2024021037

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-09
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the unload sort, the package was mishandled and moved upside down which caused a spillage. The package was covered with a plastic bag and the spillage was contained by kitty litter. DescribePack: The cap and the seal under the cap were loosened by the mishandling of the package. The seal was not securely placed under the cap. This caused the leak with the loosen cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The spillage was contained with kitty litter. The package was covered with a plastic bag.

item.title: Report X-2024020634
item.description:
Report X-2024020634

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: BLAUVELT
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: ABOUT 7:27 AM, MANAGER CALL QA TO THE BELT Q, THERE WAS A HAZMAT LEAKING. THE HAZMAT WAS PLACE ON THE TUGGER. LOADED THE CONVEYOR BELT. THE MANAGER OBSERVED THE BOX IS WET OUT. QA OPENED THE BOX AND OBSERVED THERE WAS A PRECATALYZED CLEAR LACQUER FOR WOOD FLOOR. TOOK THE PAIL, PUT THE PAIL IN A RED BIN AND PROCEED TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. NO LEAKING ON THE FLOOR. ONLY THE BOX WAS WET. DescribePack: THE BOX WAS WET. THE PAIL HAD A DENT ON THE BOTTON. 44.10 POUNDS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT THE PAIL IN A RED BIN.

item.title: Report X-2024020619
item.description:
Report X-2024020619

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was sent over the HITTS sorter and was crushed by another package when discovered on load side 2 was promptly cleaned up in house. DescribePack: The cap was loose already and when the package was hit it caused a leak from the closure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was called and promptly cleaned up all remnants of the spill.

item.title: Report X-2024020346
item.description:
Report X-2024020346

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the unloading process of the sort, the package was dropped on its base. The pressure of the drop caused the plastic pail to split a 2" crack that leaked the solution from the container. DescribePack: There was a 2" diameter split on the bottom of the pail. The solution poured out the pail uncontrollably. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Kitty litter was used to contain the spillage and to alert of the spillage.

item.title: Report X-2024020359
item.description:
Report X-2024020359

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024020359 SequenceEvent: QA WAS CALLED TO THE UNLOAD TO INSPECT POSSIBLE LEAKING HAZMAT. OUTSIDE PACKAGING WAS WET DescribePack: CONTENTS ESCAPED FROM BREATHER HOLE IN CAP OF CONTAINER POSSIBLY FROM FREEZING AS LOADS WERE DELAYED FROM SNOWSTORM AND ROAD CLOSURES DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CONTAINED IN SALVAGE DRUM, REPORTS FILED. 2. X-2024020361 SequenceEvent: QA WAS CALLED TO THE UNLOAD TO INSPECT POSSIBLE LEAKING HAZMAT. OUTSIDE OF PACKAGING WAS WET. DescribePack: CONTENTS ESCAPED FROM BREATHER HOLE IN CAPS OF CONTAINERS. POSSIBLY FROM FREEZING AS LOADS WERE DELAYED DUE TO SDNOWSTORMS AND ROAD CLOSURES. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: PACAKGE CONTAINED IN SALVAGE DRUM, REPORTS FILED.
